name: Hellven
introduce: Hellven Metaverse is a paradise for a new generation of crypto players and gaming enthusiasts. The concept of Hellven Metaverse revolves around GameFi, social, 3D digital space, and virtual assets, aiming to create a creators’ metaverse. When users enter the Hellven Metaverse, they not only experience gaming but also socialize in virtual digital space and participate in various themed events. It aims to create a truly open, free, and innovative platform that provides users with a broader digital world, a more diverse gaming experience, and more economic opportunities.
